vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀπορφᾰνίζω,
bereave, τινὰ παιδός[Refs]:—passive, to be orphaned, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἀπό τινος ἀ. to be torn away from..,[NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to make an orphan of
literally, to make an orphan; figuratively, to deprive, bereave, 1Thess. 2:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 使成為孤兒 (保羅以此比喻與他們的分離, # 帖前 2:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 使成为孤儿 (保罗以此比喻与他们的分离, # 帖前 2:17)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: xa cách; tước cha mẹ, mồ côi, côi cút
